software.description: Brainance DTI Module is a web-based highly accurate and user friendly fiber tracking software created by Advantis Medical Imaging. The fiber tracking methodology developed and implemented achieves extremely high accuracy rates (90%) in the final 3D reconstruction of the nerve fibers, compared to the existing deterministic methodologies which do not exceed 65%. Create an account through our website (http://advantis.io/) and start using our one-month free trial!
